Game.Name: Momotarou Katsugeki (Japan)
Game.plot: Momotarou Katsugeki is an Action game, published by Hudson,which was released in Japan in 1990.Cheat: Ending PasswordsAt the password screen, enter the following Japanese characters. Format is Row #, Column #.Cheat: Ending PasswordsAt the password screen, enter the following Japanese characters. Format is Row #, Column #.Cheat: Ending PasswordsAt the password screen, enter the following Japanese characters. Format is Row #, Column #.- 2,11 - 4,1 - 2,7 - 3,2 - 4,1 - 4,4 - 3,11 - 2,11 - 5,2 - 3,5 - 2,7 - 5,6 - 3,7 - 3,4 - 3,3 - 5,2 - 3,13 - 3,4 - 4,9 - 1,5 - 2,1 - 5,1 - 1,1 - 5,5 - 4,1 - 3,4 - 5,5 - 3,4 - 5,2 - 4,1 - 5,8 - 1,2 -Cheat: Ending PasswordsAt the password screen, enter the following Japanese characters. Game.Notes: Platform game based around Peachboy or Momotaro, a boy born from a peach. You are armed with a sword that shoots peaches, and collecting coins allows you to upgrade this and your armour. As you progress, you also get the option to call your animal friends for help.
